pages.title: Wishing upon a Star
pages.text: $(italic)The calmness of the night invites you to lie down in the grass and watch the stars.

pages.title: Shooting Stars
pages.text: The small Shooting Stars are made of a material unknown to you thus far.$(br2)Can you catch one right off the sky?$(br2)$(italic)Tip: Shooting Stars are much easier to spot when using a Telescope or Night Vision.$()

pages.title: Stardust
pages.text: A powder of unknown origin blessed with the soul of the stars.$(br)Bears coy, yet latent power.
